eally appreciate your response, but adding a boolean isAcceptMatch()

od to WmLoggerFilter, would mean changing the class which is under

=
> Could this be an acceptable test case?


It's a matter of personal taste.=
  Personally, I don't have any problems
adding entry points to my classes j=
ust to make them easier to test.  The
question is usually more along the li=
nes of "what visibility should these
entry points have?" and "package-prote=
cted" is usually a good default.

If you don't want to do that, your altern=
ative is to introspect your class
(using setAccessible(true)) and verify th=
at your private field received the
expected value...

--
C=E9dric
